name: Fight 4 Hope
description: Fight4Hope is a Battle Royale type of gameplay where players engage in ship-to-ship combat until only one remains - earning tokens and status along the way. Taking place in space, users experience high end graphics made with Unreal Engine 5 as they battle with the dimensions of space, and their fellow competitors. Fight4Hope utilizes a play-to-earn model by distributing the F4H token through mining and game activities, thus giving value to players NFTs by increasing their use in game features. After winning battles, players can choose to upgrade their ships to become stronger, faster, and more powerful allowing them to master the battlefield. NFTs are freely traded on the marketplace for F4H tokens, and the tokens can be freely sold on the DEX. Join the fight today!
